ValidationRule.description: User must enter either a contact or user before saving the the resource.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(AND(MPM4_BASE__Contact__c = null, MPM4_BASE__User__c = null), AND(MPM4_BASE__Contact__c != null, MPM4_BASE__User__c != null))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter either a contact or user before saving the the resource.
